explanation: The stage direction describes a change in the setting of the play. It mentions that 'Tout disparaît' (Everything disappears) and that 'Le Théâtre change' (The Theater changes) to represent 'l'intérieur redoutable du château-fort des rois de la Bactriane' (the formidable interior of the fortress of the kings of Bactriana). Thus, it is clearly indicating a new setting for the scene.
stgdir: Tout disparaît. Le Théâtre change. Il représente l'intérieur redoutable du château-fort des rois de la Bactriane
